text: Vasaloppet de la Sergerie is a cross-country skiing event. It is held around Le Norv√©gien in the Quebec Province in Canada. The event was first held in 2007 The event is held in February or early March. The event is named after Vasaloppet in Sweden. == References == Category:Skiing in Canada Category:Sport in Quebec Category:2007 establishments in Canada
title: Vasaloppet de la Sergerie
